description: St Johnstone 1-0 Hamilton Academical: Have your say
title: St Johnstone 1-0 Hamilton Academical: Have your say
title_page: St Johnstone 1-0 Hamilton Academical: Have your say - BBC Sport
maintext:
St Johnstone fans, were you at McDiarmid Park to see your side reach the last eight of the Scottish Cup or were your following along from home? Either way, we want your thoughts.
Have your say on the game., external
